```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
Step: Cooker hex 
```{r}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(hexSticker, dplyr, magick, rsvg, ggplot2)
img <- image_read("~/shiny_360_app_example/cooker.png")
res = img %>% 
  image_resize("1080 x 200")

res
```
Step: make sticker
```{r}
final_res<-sticker(res, package="cookeR", p_size=9,
             p_y = 1.5,
             s_x=1, s_y=0.8, s_width=1.1,
             s_height = 14,
        filename="cookeR.png",h_fill="#062047")

plot(final_res)
```
